extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     SPAN301.
One-way exclusion    May not be taken with or after SPAN401; SPAN402.

basic.description: This course provides a comprehensive review of the most difficult aspects of Spanish grammar through advanced exercises in reading, composition, and conversation. The goal of the course is to consolidate and perfect the student¿s written and oral skills.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Gramática avanzada y composición II
